# LeafProperty.Sgx.SGX1 property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

SGX1. If true, Indicates Intel SGX supports the collection of SGX1 leaf functions (Subleaf 1)

Key Composition

* Leaf: Sgx
* Property: SGX1
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey SGX1 { get; }
```
